website_summaries.verdict: This gel cleanser gradually foams and lifts away dirt and toxins from oily skin without over-drying.
pros: An Allure beauty award winner, this product is oil-free and non-irritating, making it a good choice for particularly sensitive and oily skin types
cons: Some customers report issues getting the cleanser out of the bottle

customer_reviews.title: Skip this, buy the moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed the La Roche-Posay moisturizer but the purifying gel feels like it strips your face a bit too harshly. While I do feel it cleanses, I am not convinced it is keeping my skin healthy. I've needed to moisturize 3 fold since I started using this product and the "foaming" is minimal in comparison to other brands. From now on it will be used as a body acne cleanser only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gives you acne
customer_reviews.text: gave me pimples. Never had them until I tried this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pires Family

customer_reviews.title: Best ever (extremely oily skin)
customer_reviews.text: My skin usually shines like a disco ball from the oil slick in my face. Gross? Yeah. I know. But since using this cleanser along with the moisturizer, my skin has improved so much. I only need to dab away the oil after about 5-6 hours instead of every hour or two. My makeup doesn't run everywhere anymore either. My mascara doesn't bleed onto my under eye area either. I've also seen a GREAT improvement on the size of my pores. This cleanser is easy to work on your face, there's no odor, no tingling or tightness. I highly recommend this product along with the moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Rhavaniel

customer_reviews.title: A great cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product! I've been using this cleanser (with a combination of other facial products) for about a month now and my pores look smaller and my face is clear! My skin is pretty sensitive and I was nervous about my face breaking out but once I started using it, all my concerns were gone! It leaves your face feeling fresh, clean, and clear!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great but the price in America sucks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this everyday for the past 4 years. I feel like it might have made my skin sensitive (I’ve never had sensitive skin) to other products because I can’t use anything else without my skin breaking out. I tried one summer to go to a salicylic (which is what I used for years) and ended up having hideous acne break out on my jawline which took 4 months to get rid of. It was really bad. Anyhow I’ve been using it for years and my only gripe is that I get the 500ml for the same price in Paris. I wish it wasn’t as expensive and the larger bottle sizes were available in America.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It’s now firmly placed in my daily routine.
customer_reviews.text: I have tricky skin. It’s very picky about products. And often the slightest change in my routine will cause weeks of acne or dryness. I decided to give this product a try. And I’m glad I did. I’ve been using it once a day and have seen no change in the decent skin I’ve worked hard to maintain. No breakouts. No dryness. If you’re on the fence. Go for it. Try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Safe choice
customer_reviews.text: It cleanses well and doesn't irritate my skin. I took off one star because it leaves a slightly slippery feeling on my face (oily + acne prone) after rinsing. So this is one of the safe choices but doesn't do wonder for me either. A tube should last forever since you only need a little bit to lather.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily folks !
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really have a scent of any sort but I’ve used it for the past ten years . It’s great if you have oily skin , just remember to moisturize afterwords or you’ll either get too dry or your skin will overcompensate and produce too much oil . This stuff got rid of all of my zits a good ten to fifteen years ago in my youth and I use it to keep my oil levels balanced with a moisturizer in my old age
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily/acne prone skin!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research online and this product kept coming up for oily/combination skin, so I decided to give it a try. For me, it has been nothing short of amazing, I still get occasional breakouts but nothing compared to before. My face appears cleaner, softer and brighter! I use every morning and night and have seen a dramatic decrease in how oily my face appears. I do experience drying where my face isn’t as oily, mostly my cheeks, but I pair this with my moisturizer and haven’t had any concerning issues.. I will continue to purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Hali

customer_reviews.title: Not great for Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this La Roche-Posay purifying foaming cleanser especially for using as a daily face cleanser for my face and neck areas that tend to get oily and break out. I used this product for a few weeks and it irritated my one side of my face so bad i stopped using it for a few days. This is not great for people with oily and very sensitive skin. Glad I got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Mulani

customer_reviews.title: Made my entire face peel like I'd been sunburned
customer_reviews.text: Extremely drying. Made my entire face peel like I'd been sunburned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cleanser. I wasn't sure what to expect as it was my first time trying this brand. I have a VERY oily chin and forehead area. This cleanser wiped out the oil without over-drying and left my skin feeling refreshed and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Good & affordable cleanser, can be overly stripping if you use too much. amazing at controlling sebum production and overall just does its job as a cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: A must have for me
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, I have noticed a difference in just a matter of days. I have very sensitive skin, suffer from both hormonal and stress acne and this product has noticeably improved my complexion. It also has a pleasnt light scent... Reminds me of lillies
customer_reviews.author: Debora M.

customer_reviews.title: The smell of this product is terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this face wash for my oily skin! The smell of this product is absolutely atrocious! It literally smells like I am putting burnt rubber on my face! It is absolutely terrible I cannot stand to use it. I can only imagine the horrific chemicals that are pit in this product. I do not recommend this pro cut at all.
customer_reviews.author: deanna encarnacion

customer_reviews.title: Pros: Foams well Cons: That is ALL that ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Foams well Cons: That is ALL that it does. Foams on my face but provides nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: No more cyst acne!
customer_reviews.text: I was starting to have really bad cyst acne and regualr acne at the age of 24. Never had acne before and it was really bad. I started using this and it has lessened my acne. No more cyst acne but I still get a few white heads. I am happy with it. But I'm going see a dermatologist cause it still hasnt gone away fully. But this stuff works for me.
customer_reviews.author: cassidy broussard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best face wash for sensitive skin. I’m in my late 20s and still have little pimples and sometimes big pimples, large pores run in my family so I can’t use anything too heavy. This is the best face wash, this and the similar avene wash are all I use now along with an exfoliating wash twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It's not good for my sensitive skin, every time I use it, my skin feel burned after using this, after I switch to another face wash, symptoms goes away. I tried several times, and its still the same problem, I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: MuMiao

customer_reviews.title: Works really good with combination skin
customer_reviews.text: It is my first time to try la roche-posay products. I liked how this gel wash and purify my face.
customer_reviews.author: suaad

customer_reviews.title: Skin miracle!
customer_reviews.text: The ABSOLUTE BEST wash for my complicated skin!!! I'm in love! My skin is so oily, but gets so dry with washing. This stuff leaves my skin soft afterward and I have no issues with oil all day. I will never use another face wash!
customer_reviews.author: Max Lechner

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!  BREAK OUT CITY
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't smell bad. But it definitely made me break out more. I actually resorted to ice cubes on my face cause the break out was so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty oily and sensitive skin when I used this product it completely dried my skin out to the point that my skin was itchy and burning. I personally would not recommend this for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: tabby

customer_reviews.title: Best face cleaner I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: Best face cleaner I’ve used. Very gentle but super effective. No residue, no scent. Doesn’t dry out skin. Been using for years, and won’t switch to anything else unless they stop making it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Dermatologist recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The only face wash I use recommended by my dermatologist. This cleanses you face abs does not over dry it. Been using this product for yours.
customer_reviews.author: TheGreenHat

customer_reviews.title: Answer to my oily/dry combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. My dermatologist suggested this brand because she uses it and it does work wonders. My face cleared up with the exception of one problematic area. I've received compliments from others on my glowing complexion. All I have to do now is find a nice moisturizer to pair with it.
customer_reviews.author: Josette

customer_reviews.title: It's okay... cleans well enough. I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay... cleans well enough. I'm not nuts about the smell. Hasn't made me break out or anything, but hasn't worked miracles on my skin, either.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Acne
customer_reviews.text: I deal with constant acne no matter what I do! But I have to say this product hands down has changed my life! My acne was gone within a week and ever since hasn't been occurring as often as it has in the past. If I'm noticing a pimple coming up, it's instantly gone within a few days. Now I just need to work on my scarring and makeup-free will be the new look.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have been using daily for 3 weeks and my skin has responded well and has cleared up significantly. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: A little drying but overall great
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent face wash. I have combination skin and this product dries me out a little, nothing moisturizer can't help. I also have sensitive skin and it causes my face to be a little red after but that goes away within 10 minutes. It has a mild scent. I have noticed less breakouts and less oil though so I think it does the job pretty good. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Archer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money On this one😡
customer_reviews.text: Just Terrible. After washing my face is there nothing to help me with acne and oily skin. Didn’t even feel like it cleaned my face
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon G.

customer_reviews.title: Not for all...
customer_reviews.text: Smell was not nice and it definitely did not work for my sensitive skin, even after sticking to it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: abbey7412

customer_reviews.title: Too much fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: I can't handle all the synthetic flowery fragrance, it makes me stuffy and gives me a headache. The product would be great without it!
customer_reviews.author: Hughes Family

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have much of a perfume scent. Just a clean soapy scent. Coupled with a moisturizer, I felt like it's made a difference on my skin and would recommend it to anyone. My skin feels pretty much normal now with the occasional oilyness (prob from sweat throughout the day), but way different then when I first started.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: So good!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaner. It really helps keep my acne prone skin clean without over drying my skin or leaving a residue. I’ve repurchased this several times and will always repurchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this along with the effaclar duo moisturizer, and it really helped with my skin's oiliness and acne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Foaming Facial Wash
customer_reviews.text: This is a great face wash. I have very oily skin and notice skin does not appear as oily. Foamy, smells good and you only need a little. Skin feels nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Grays

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have had products of this brand before, which made me chose this cleanser. The bottle seems to last a while, its gentle for the skin, it doesnt make much foam but I use a good amount in my face and its ok for me. The only thing I dont like is that it contains sulfate that is not so good for skin pores.
customer_reviews.author: Pam A.

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser for Acne
customer_reviews.text: Best cleanser for acne probe skin. My dermatologist recommended i use this cleanser and its amazing, no scent which os awesome for sensitive skin. Also you need very little product to wash your entire face. It is pricey but it will last you the looooongest time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I generally have really oily skin and this cleanser does a good job at combating that, however it has also left my skin dry. It does make my face feel clean but I will probably have to discontinue use due to it drying out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Daisha Miller

customer_reviews.title: The scent it different!
customer_reviews.text: I got the same product from Amazon last year. I still have some left. The scent of the new one is totally different. I got pimples after using it for three days. I don't know if it's season-related or caused by the cleanser. I don't remember about the last one I got. But this one doesn't have sealer.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Liu

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use this since I was teen, recommendation of my dermatologist
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Purifying Foaming Cleanse for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love it. You use such a tiny amount that this tube will last a looonngg time. And it works.
customer_reviews.author: joalex1

customer_reviews.title: My favor face wash
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite face wash. I have been using this for ages.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: no more breakouts
customer_reviews.text: my skin has never looked better! its not too harsh and you’re left with the most amazing clean feeling afterwards! definitely worth a shot
customer_reviews.author: Mireya

customer_reviews.title: Not scent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a year now semi daily use. It works great for me and it doesn’t take much to sudd up. Not much of a scent
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash
customer_reviews.text: La Roche Posay is known for its delicate cleansing and good product ingredients. This does not dry out my skin like other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vido

customer_reviews.title: Just a great facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Just a great facial cleanser! Can’t say enough, I’m a guy and iv had people ask what I use on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensible skin!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I have sensible skin so this is the best one for me!
customer_reviews.author: Raell Joussef Armijos Lama

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with acne for years. My dermatologist recommended this face wash and it is the only thing that has worked to clear my acne. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have when you have a very sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: ALI h.

customer_reviews.title: By far the best facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Leaves skin feeling soft and not dry. I have combination skin and this product is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Vannika

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite face washes
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite face washes, but do not use during the winter or cold months or your skin will dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Austin

customer_reviews.title: suitable for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Most suitable for sensitive skin. It doesn't make you feel dry at all.
customer_reviews.author: Long Pham

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: i have yet to have any issue with any of this brand's products. good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: ... different face washes and this is hands down the best I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a million different face washes and this is hands down the best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s very good for oily skin. And my acne became much better. It can be a little dry but you should use some hydrating cream.
customer_reviews.author: alba.mayer

customer_reviews.title: feel dry but clean
customer_reviews.text: A little dry, but I like this feeling because I feel clean
customer_reviews.author: blacklamb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had major breakouts since using this product What a change !
customer_reviews.author: Elodie Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: Best facial soap ever
customer_reviews.text: It leaves my face clean and clear of imperfections without over drying! Has a really good smell and has helped me a lot. Use it every day, and with the complete effaclar or la roche-posey line for better results.. I use it with the effaclar tonic and love them both
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rios Rios

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this soap for 5 years it's really good for my skin
customer_reviews.author: Fhend11

customer_reviews.title: Adverse effect
customer_reviews.text: This actively made my skin break out at a rate I have never experienced and I am 34.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser and one thing lasts forever. Great for oily acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ruppenicker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of problems with breakouts, but this product consistently works for me and doesn't irritate my skin at all. Makes my face feel fresh, soft and clean and has a very light scent. I really like this product
customer_reviews.author: Laura O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great wash and very light. Not as foamy as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: cera

customer_reviews.title: Grea Product
customer_reviews.text: This product helped to rebalance my combination/sensitive skin within days. Still breaking out but no longer battling excema along with it.
customer_reviews.author: KrisH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's okay not the best. Try to find cheaper better items.
customer_reviews.author: Nima M.

customer_reviews.title: My go to cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cleanser for years and it is the best for my skin. I have combination skin and it never irritates or clogs my pores
customer_reviews.author: Brielle

customer_reviews.title: the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product on March and still have more than half of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Umanzor

customer_reviews.title: Clean without stripping natural oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser. My skin feels clean and it doesn't strip natural oil. Good for sensitive and prone acne skin
customer_reviews.author: yellowmug

customer_reviews.title: ... only need a very small amount to get a nice lather. I usually double cleanse and use this ...
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the fact that the amount that you get is really small because you really only need a very small amount to get a nice lather. I usually double cleanse and use this second, and it works well for my normal to combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: Surya

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is ph-balanced and contains no alcohol and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is ph-balanced and contains no alcohol and when I rinse it doesn't leave any type of film that could possibly clog pores. You usually don't have to use too much to work up a good lather. However, I have noticed that it doesn't clean my face properly and I usually tone my face after cleansing with it and their still a fear amount of dirt and oil on my face. I would definitely recommend using this in the morning if you may need to use a cleanser in the morning and remove any type of makeup before using this to cleanse your face. I also wish it was a little more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Do not like this face wash
customer_reviews.text: Do not like this face wash. Since using it I have had insane breakouts. Definitely will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: mattnangel steers

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately this product did not make any difference in my oily acneic skin. I woke up everyday with different pimples. I used this in conjunction with the effacer k...OH boy what a mess this left behind. Now I am using a product I found online, totally but mistake and is working wonderfully on my skin. I wish the seller can read this maybe I still have time to return it. I just threw in my junk drawer almost halfway full. If this works for anyone, I would be happy to sell it to you @ half of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Foxxy

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is not for sensitive skin. Made me breakout in a rash in a matter of 3 days. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using it for 4 years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for 4 years now. Only put it little bit on oily spots because it dries your skin quickly and the pimples dry out. The next day your skin will be flawless. I will never use another product again!
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: I have tried everything!
customer_reviews.text: I am 23 years old and I am still suffering from the same acne problems I did when i was a teenager. I have went to countless dermatologist, and have tried countless treatments (antibiotics, chemical peels, proactive, and several other over the counter acne products) you name it I've probably tried it. I went to a local skin care facility and the doctor highly recommended this product and brand. I started using it immediately and I have been using it for about 6 months now and it actually does work! Not has it completely eliminated my blemishes it also evened out my skin tone tremendously! I am very satisfied with this product and would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Parent

customer_reviews.title: Works well, very gentle
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all of them. Biore, Clearasil, and my old favorite Aveeno. I swore by Aveeno facial products until I tried this stuff. Yes, its expensive, but to me worth it because I went from the occasional blemish to hardly ever. And a little tiny bit goes a long way. If you have mild acne issues, I would give this a try. Everyone's face is different, but this wont break the bank to try it. You might discover it's perfect for you. Also, I added the Effaclar Duo product and that too was awesome. Also very expensive but a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this before it worked better last time. I think I'll have to give it a while
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Works really good on oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Works really good on oily skin. It had helped my skin to look more natural and reduce the oily feeling and looking.
customer_reviews.author: Maite Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Has a fragrance
customer_reviews.text: After reading the fanfare for this product line, I had such high hopes, but, you guys, there is a scent in this that will remind you of bygone herbal products of our teen years. I’m wondering why a skin company would put a hideous scent like that in a product for people with acne prone skin? Fragrance is like number one on the long list of things that break me out. Hence, I don’t think it’s in my head that this has been breaking me out.
customer_reviews.author: TwoCatsAndCounting

customer_reviews.title: ... so much hype that I cannot help but be disappointed - nothing more than your average non-foaming facewash
customer_reviews.text: This product received so much hype that I cannot help but be disappointed - nothing more than your average non-foaming facewash.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Cook

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but should be less price wise
customer_reviews.text: Good, but not sure it's worth the price. I usually use Lancome face wash, but I was in a crunch so I bought this instead this time. It is only a few dollars less than the one I usually use, but it's not quite as nice. It does seem to clean well, though. But, it has a soapy/chemical smell even though it says soap free. It also doesn't foam as much as I like my face wash to for easy spreading purposes. But, it is decent. I don't think at this price I'd reorder, though.
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, simple cleanser for someone with oily skin that wants to remove dirt.
customer_reviews.author: shayna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it since 5 years and so far its the hest for my combination and sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Alena Audziyenak

customer_reviews.title: So I’ve been using this product for a little over ...
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve been using this product for a little over 2 months as directed and I have not seen a change in my oil production or my overall skin issues. I am a very oily person in the T zone and unfortunately, this did nothing to change that. I plan on using the bottle until it’s done, but would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jameila

customer_reviews.title: This product does such a great job of removing impurities from your skin
customer_reviews.text: This product does such a great job of removing impurities from your skin. As a person who suffers from oily-acne prone skin, this stuff has really helped me clear up my skin, while it's still not perfect it has come a long way from the various breakouts and uncontrollable t-zone oil. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a good face wash for oily skin!
customer_reviews.author: Layla Nava

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this products for many years and always has same the quality and performance . I love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: LP ROSETTI

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this face wash
customer_reviews.text: Leaves skin feeling so clean and fresh! Nice smell and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SLS Stings!!!
customer_reviews.text: made my face sting immediately! I think it might be the sls in the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Addicted!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this I was in Paris ten years ago. I went to a pharmacy because my face was oily, dirty and starting to break out from the environment and from walking around all day long. The french lady did not speak English well, but knew what I was saying. She led me directly to this product and I have been using it with great success ever since!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Wash Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have dealt with severe acne for years. My dermatologist suggested effaclar and it is above and beyond the best product I've ever purchased. It has made such a noticeable difference for me. I am thrilled it is now being sold on Amazon because before I was paying for it to be shipped from Europe. The gel is highly concentrated so one tube lasts me about 5 months. I usually never write reviews on Amazon but this is one I had to write.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: Great! And it works!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying the items I've purchased from La Roche-Posay. This cleanser does its job just fine; I just seem to prefer the "cream" version of this cleanser rather than the gel. That's just personal preference. I think they both work the same, though. The cream (obviously) is a bit thicker and easier to handle than the gel is.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Too strong for me!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 35 year old woman who is still very much acne prone so I thought this face wash would be helpful. I took into account that while I'm acne prone, my skin is also very sensitive, so I only used this once at night and every other night over a two week period. Well, even that proved to be too strong for me. It dried my (oily) skin to the point that it became flaky and red with irritation in certain spots. I have since discontinued use of the medicated cleanser, but I do use Effaclar's gel foaming cleanser as well as the mat moisturizer and I'm very happy with those products.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Bean

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Made my acne worse! I tried it for over a month and I am extrememlty unsatisfied. I wish they would let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I am somewhat of a product junkie, so to speak and I love to try new things and see how they work. This is not my first time purchasing this product, this is one of those repeat buys. It has a fresh clean smell and refreshing finish once used. I use this with my clarisonic and the outcome never disappoints. Buy this product, you will ridiculously happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is great!!!!! A friend who is a makeup artist recommended the product to me. I have frequent breakouts and have seen dermatologists that keep trying different medications. This product seemed to help. I've been using it for about 5 months. Make sure to give it some time to work so you can get the full effects from it (a couple of months). The price compared to stores is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: GirasoleAmante

customer_reviews.title: The foaming action is fantastic and it cleans the makeup off really well
customer_reviews.text: The foaming action is fantastic and it cleans the makeup off really well. But this combined with the La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Epidermal Accelerator Pro Recovery Skincare is leaving my rosacea prone skin a mess. I am suffering for more breakouts and flareups. It looks like I am going back to the Toleriane line.
customer_reviews.author: Cat J

customer_reviews.title: Good Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: If you have oily skin like me then you will like this cleanser. Gels are what you need to use for oily skin. I still double cleanse with this product so it's not really good for those with a ton of acne but it does help some with the oil. My skin also doesn't feel stripped of moisture so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cleanser I use it with my clarsonic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleanser I use it with my clarsonic, second time purchasing and am very happy. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Susie c

product_meta.title: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Purifying Foaming Gel Cleanser for Oily Skin
product_meta.description:
Size:6.76 Fl Oz

Amazon is an authorized retailer of La Roche-Posay products.

La Roche-Posay foaming gel face wash is a daily facial cleanser for oily skin. Face wash gently cleanses dirt and oil while respecting the skin’s pH balance. An Oil-free and soap-free cleanser with a clear, refreshing gel texture. Formulated with Zinc Pidolate to purify skin and help remove excess oil and shine. Face wash tested on acne-prone skin* and sensitive skin* non-comedogenicity.

 * Soap-free
 * Oil-free
 * Paraben-free
 * Alcohol-free

Use as a daily facial cleanser for oily skin. Cleanse morning and/or evening. Face wash is gentle enough for everyday use. Wet face with lukewarm water and apply small amount of cleanser gel, massaging the skin gently to form a rich lather. Rinse face wash thoroughly with water. Ingredients: Water , Sodium Laureth Sulfate , PEG-8 , Coco-Betaine , Hexylene Glycol , Sodium Chloride , PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate , Zinc PCA , Sodium Hydroxide , Citric Acid , Sodium Benzoate , Phenoxyethanol , Caprylyl Glycol , Parfum/Fragrance.

Product packaging may vary.



BRAND STORY
Recommended by 90,000 dermatologists worldwide, La Roche-Posay offers unique daily skincare developed using a strict formulation charter and stringent clinical testing for efficacy and safety, even on sensitive skin.
